channel.title: Zenith Scape [718/728] Where your fun never ends!
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://zenithscape.com/forums/images/imperial/logo.png[/img] [/center]
We are a rsps dedicated to the players, we dont care about money, we dont care about cursing in game, we care about making the experaince playing the rsps fun for us and fun for the players. We take great caution with all staff promotions and make sure that the staff are always 100% helpfull and nice to the players. If you are in game and staff is a literall dick to you, please report it in our forums, it will be handled asap!
Our number one goal as devs on our server is rather than getting lots of donations is playercount, personally as the owner I could careless for any pennies, sure it helps for the small website and server bills. But i would rather see a high playercount.
[center] Website: http://www.zenithscape.com Forums: http://www.zenithscape.com/forums/ Webclient: http://www.zenithscape.com/webclient.html Wiki: http://www.zenithscape.com/wiki/ (Under Construction) Highscores: http://www.zenithscape.com/highscores/ Vote: http://www.zenithscape.com/vote/ [/center]
[center] WebDevs: Bug WikiDevs: Emmence and Nolan Server Devs: Lolphjg and Me Chief in Command: Zalo [/center]
[center] INFO
98% Squeal (Only since i cbf'd to get the tab id atm) 100% MoneyPouch Great Shops Amazing Pk Amazing Bosses Amazing Minigames Awesome Website Great staff Great Players Great Dev's
Bosses:
QBD Frosts Balance Elemental GodWars Nex Kalphite Queen Nomad Bork Glacors King Black Dragon Tormented Demons Corp And more to come!
23 Trainable Skills, with great benefits for each skill! :) 2 Cutsom Quests, one for Avas, and the other for customized shop, RFD (Recipe For Disaster) Each new wave you make it past you unlock a new set of gloves in the shop! Tons of minigames, including runespan, sorceress garden, clan wars, castle wars, safe pk, and soon pest control! Dungeoneering that actually works!!!!! Fight Caves Kiln And much much more!
[/center]
[center] Media
New Tohkar Kal Cape [img]http://puu.sh/OSw2.jpg[/img]
Full MoneyPouch [img]http://puu.sh/OSyM.jpg[/img]
Full Squeal [img]http://puu.sh/OSzJ.jpg[/img]
Squeal Reward Screen after Spinning [img]http://puu.sh/OSAz.jpg[/img]
New Teleports
Ninja [img]http://puu.sh/OSBa.jpg[/img]
Demon [img]http://puu.sh/OSDn.jpg[/img]
Pegasus [img]http://puu.sh/OSCH.jpg[/img]
All new emotes
[img]http://puu.sh/OSFO.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/OSHb.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/OSHt.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/OSI0.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/OSJv.jpg[/img]
Jadinkos [img]http://puu.sh/OSL3.jpg[/img]
Polypore [img]http://puu.sh/OSM2.jpg[/img]
QBD Matrix's, i reworked some of the combat though to make it more of a challenge :) [img]http://puu.sh/OSMW.jpg[/img]
Balance Elemental [img]http://puu.sh/OSOu.jpg[/img]
RuneSpan with working point system, currently working on a shop for it! [img]http://puu.sh/OSRf.jpg[/img]
[/center]
Credits: Matrix Dev Team Lolphjg, extremely trustworthy and legit guy! Alex/Dragonkk <<<< Legend beyond all legends!
I would add more but i had to cut making it short due to leaving on a trip! My chief in command and codev are in charge while im gone, thanks and sorry for the crappy title, couldnt think of any better catch phrase :P
